about_the_game:
PLEASE NOTE: This software is a server application for Infuse VR. To use the full functionality of Infuse VR you should install the free client application for the following headsets:
  • Quest 2
  • Quest 3
  • Pico 4
  • HTC Focus 3
For client application installation instructions, visit our website!


Infuse VR is a headset streaming (ALVR) application and a hand and gaming accessories visualisation software for VR gamers. When you put on your VR glasses, you go blind in the real world. You can't use your mouse, keyboard and often have to fumble around for the joystick, throttle, handbrake or even the gearshift.
Infuse VR solves this problem.
You can see your hands and your own gaming accessories in the virtual space, so you can see the world around you while you play.
You can build custom controllers or even entire cockpits and display them in-game. (PRO version)
Playing a motion simulator? You can use the built-in motion compensation module (only Yaw2 motion simulator for now)
Can't find your controller in the list? No problem, you can create your own 3D model and upload it to Infuse (PRO version)

Main functions:

  • Hand visualisation (with finger tracking)
  • Gaming accessories visualisation
  • Different types of visualisation:
    • X-ray
    • Transparent
    • Colored
    • Original shading
  • Multi profiles (load and save)
  • Motion compensation
  • Wifi / USB streaming (ALVR)

What is included in the FREE version:
  • Hand visualisation (with finger tracking)
  • 1 accessory visualisation
  • X-ray visualisation
  • Motion compensation
  • Wifi / USB streaming (ALVR)

What is included in the PRO version:
  • All the FREE features
  • Unlimited accessory visualisation
  • Custom accessories
  • All types of visualisation:
    • X-ray
    • Transparent
    • Colored
    • Original shading
  • Multi profiles (load and save)

name: Infuse VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any VR capable graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • VR Support: Works with Steam VR and the following standalone headsets: Quest 1/2/Pro, Pico 4/Neo 3, Vive Focus 3/XR Elite, YVR 1/2
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Infuse VR is a headset streaming (ALVR) and a gaming accessories and hand visualisation software for VR gamers.
